alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 4:53PM EDT until June 26 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 452 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cross Roads, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Red Lion, Windsor, Cross Roads, Shenks Ferry, Brogue, Safe Harbor, East Prospect, Winterstown and Felton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
